Key Match Events: Son Heung-min scored a brace and assisted one goal
South Korea broke the deadlock just 11 minutes into the match
Tan Long was close to find the equalizer for China in the 42nd minute
South Korea sealed the 3-0 victory on 86 minutes
Miscellaneous Highlights: In the opening matches of Group C last Thursday, China rallied to beat Thailand 2-1 in Bangkok, and South Korea thrashed Singapore 5-0 at home
Others: In the other Group C match on Tuesday, Thailand secured an away victory over Singapore 3-1

In the second stage of the Asian qualifying tournament, 36 teams have been divided into nine groups competing in a home-and-away round-robin format. The top two of each group will advance to the third stage.
